description: LinkedIn is a professional networking platform enabling job seekers, companies, and thought leaders to connect, share content, and discover business opportunities

capabilities.name: LINKEDIN_CREATE_LINKED_IN_POST
capabilities.description: Creates a new post on LinkedIn for the authenticated user or an organization they manage; ensure the user has necessary permissions if posting for an organization.

capabilities.name: LINKEDIN_DELETE_LINKED_IN_POST
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific LinkedIn post (share) by its unique `share_id`, which must correspond to an existing share.

capabilities.name: LINKEDIN_GET_COMPANY_INFO
capabilities.description: Retrieves organizations where the authenticated user has specific roles (ACLs), to determine their management or content posting capabilities for LinkedIn company pages.

capabilities.name: LINKEDIN_GET_MY_INFO
capabilities.description: Fetches the authenticated LinkedIn user's profile, notably including the 'author_id' required for attributing content such as posts or articles.
